statements: SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT username, age FROM player_profiles WHERE level > 5;
SELECT player_id, email FROM player_profiles WHERE username LIKE '%john%';
SELECT player_id, email, level FROM player_profiles WHERE age < 25 ORDER BY level DESC;
SELECT player_id, username, experience FROM player_profiles WHERE level = 10 AND age > 30 ORDER BY experience DESC, age ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE age > 25 ORDER BY level DESC, experience ASC;
SELECT username, level, experience FROM player_profiles WHERE level > 5 AND experience > 1000;
SELECT player_id, username, email FROM player_profiles WHERE username LIKE 'A%' OR email LIKE '%@gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE level < 3 OR (age >= 30 AND experience > 500);
SELECT player_id, username, age FROM player_profiles WHERE email NOT LIKE '%example.com' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, email FROM player_profiles;
SELECT player_name, country, birthdate FROM player_profiles WHERE country='USA';
SELECT player_id, level, score FROM game_progress;
SELECT player_name, email, country, birthdate FROM player_profiles ORDER BY country DESC;
SELECT player_name, email, level, score FROM player_profiles INNER JOIN game_progress ON player_profiles.player_id=game_progress.player_id;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, email, birthdate FROM player_profiles WHERE birthdate BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31' ORDER BY birthdate DESC;
SELECT player_name, level, score FROM player_profiles JOIN game_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = game_progress.player_id WHERE level > 5 AND score > 1000 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_name, level, last_played FROM player_profiles JOIN game_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = game_progress.player_id WHERE country = 'Canada' ORDER BY last_played ASC;
SELECT player_name, level, score, last_played FROM player_profiles JOIN game_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = game_progress.player_id WHERE score > 500 OR level < 3 ORDER BY last_played DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name FROM player_profiles;
SELECT * FROM game_progress ORDER BY progress_percentage DESC;
SELECT player_name, email FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM achievements WHERE achievement_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT player_id, COUNT(achievement_id) AS total_achievements FROM achievements GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_achievements > 5;
SELECT player_name, email FROM player_profiles ORDER BY player_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, email FROM player_profiles ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_progress WHERE progress_percentage > 50 ORDER BY last_played DESC;
SELECT player_name, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM player_profiles JOIN achievements ON player_profiles.player_id = achievements.player_id;
SELECT player_name, progress_percentage FROM player_profiles JOIN game_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = game_progress.player_id WHERE progress_percentage < 25 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT name, email, age FROM player_profiles WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT player_id, name, country FROM player_profiles ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT player_id, level, score FROM game_progress WHERE score > 1000 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT player_id, friend_id FROM player_friends;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE age > 18 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT name, country FROM player_profiles JOIN game_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = game_progress.player_id WHERE level = 10
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM player_friends WHERE player_id = 1001
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, date_achieved FROM achievements WHERE date_achieved BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY date_achieved DESC
SELECT player_profiles.name, SUM(score) AS total_score FROM player_profiles JOIN game_progress ON player_profiles.player_id = game_progress.player_id GROUP BY player_profiles.name
SELECT * FROM player_profiles;
SELECT username, email FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM game_progress GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT * FROM player_friends JOIN player_profiles ON player_friends.friend_id = player_profiles.player_id;
SELECT achievement_name, achievement_date FROM achievements ORDER BY achievement_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM player_profiles WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT username, email FROM player_profiles WHERE registration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT player_id, level, score FROM game_progress WHERE score > 1000 ORDER BY level DESC
SELECT player_id, friend_id FROM player_friends WHERE player_id = 1
SELECT player_id, achievement_name, achievement_date FROM achievements WHERE achievement_date > '2022-01-01'
